hotels.title: Exquisite Bora Bora Escape near Matira Beach
hotels.description: Discover authentic Polynesian hospitality in the gorgeous InterContinental Bora Bora Le Moana Resort, an IHG Hotel, surrounded by waving palm trees and clear turquoise waters. Spend your days exploring famous dive sites around the island, hunt for the world-famous Tahitian black pearls, or wander around Matira Beach. When you need quality time to yourself, admire paradise from your bungalow's terrace, or enjoy an exquisite meal from one of the resort's beachfront restaurants.

hotels.vendor_name: InterContinental Bora Bora Resort & Thalasso Spa
hotels.title: Bora Bora Beachfront Oasis with Overwater Villas
hotels.description: Claiming prime real estate on Bora Bora’s sun-soaked Motu Piti Aau, the InterContinental Bora Bora Resort & Thalasso Spa, an IHG Hotel, couldn’t be better placed. Spectacular in size and beauty, this hotel has it all with eight exquisite dining venues, bars and lounges, two swimming pools and the rejuvenating Deep Ocean Spa. An endless stretch of private golden sand also offers a playground for experiences and recreation, including watersports and walks.
